## Open Sans

The Mizzou CSS Framework uses Open Sans as the base font with a good set of fallbacks sure to be available across many devices.

### Styles available

<ul className="list-unstyled miz-text--lg border miz-space--inset-lg">
  <li className="miz-text--light">Light</li>
  <li className="miz-text--light"><i>Light italic</i></li>
  <li>Regular</li>
  <li><i>Regular Italic</i></li>
  <li className="miz-text--semi-bold">Semi-bold</li>
  <li className="miz-text--semi-bold"><i>Semi-bold Italic</i></li>
  <li className="miz-text--bold">Bolder</li>
  <li className="miz-text--bold"><i>Bolder Italic</i></li>
  <li className="miz-text--bolder">Boldest</li>
  <li className="miz-text--bolder"><i>Boldest Italic</i></li>
</ul>
